cobblemon.species.barbaracle-mega.desc: It uses its many arms to toy with its opponents. This keeps the head extremely busy.
cobblemon.species.chandelure-mega.desc: One of its eyes is a window linking our world with the afterlife. This Pokémon draws in hatred and converts it into power.
cobblemon.species.chesnaught-mega.desc: It has fortified armor and a will to defend at all costs. Both are absurdly strong.
cobblemon.species.clefable-mega.desc: It flies by using the power of moonlight to control gravity within a radius of over 32 feet around it.
cobblemon.species.delphox-mega.desc: It wields flaming branches to dazzle its opponents before incinerating them with a huge fireball.
cobblemon.species.dragalge-mega.desc: It spits a liquid that causes the regenerative power of cells to run wild. The liquid is deadly poison to everything other than itself.
cobblemon.species.dragonite-mega.desc: Mega Evolution has excessively powered up this Pokémon's feelings of kindness. It finishes off its opponents with mercy in its heart.
cobblemon.species.drampa-mega.desc: Drampa's cells have been invigorated, allowing it to regain its youth. It manipulates the atmosphere to summon storms.
cobblemon.species.eelektross-mega.desc: It now generates 10 times the electricity it did before Mega Evolving. It discharges this electricity from its false Eelektrik, which are made of mucus.
cobblemon.species.emboar-mega.desc: Brandishing a blazing flame shaped like a serpentine spear, it rushes in to rescue its imperiled allies.
cobblemon.species.excadrill-mega.desc: If this Pokémon brings its arms and head together to form a streamlined shape and spins at high speeds, it can destroy anything.
cobblemon.species.falinks-mega.desc: Mega Falinks has taken on the ultimate battle formation, which can be achieved only if the troopers and brass have the strongest of bonds.
cobblemon.species.feraligatr-mega.desc: With its arms and hoodlike fin, this Pokémon forms a gigantic set of jaws with a bite 10 times as powerful as Mega Feraligatr's actual jaws.
cobblemon.species.froslass-mega.desc: This Pokémon can use eerie cold air imbued with ghost energy to freeze even insubstantial things, such as flames or the wind.
cobblemon.species.greninja-mega.desc: This Pokémon spins a giant shuriken at high speed to make it float, then clings to it upside down to catch opponents unawares.
cobblemon.species.hawlucha-mega.desc: Mega Evolution has pumped up all its muscles. Hawlucha flexes to show off its strength.
cobblemon.species.malamar-mega.desc: It uses its colorful lights to overwrite the personalities and memories of others—and to control them.
cobblemon.species.meganium-mega.desc: This Pokémon can fire a tremendously powerful Solar Beam from its four flowers. Another name for this is Mega Sol Cannon.
cobblemon.species.pyroar-mega.desc: This Pokémon spews flames hotter than 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. It swings around its grand, blazing mane as it protects its allies.
cobblemon.species.scolipede-mega.desc: Its deadly venom gives off a faint glow. The venom affects Scolipede's mind, honing its viciousness.
cobblemon.species.scrafty-mega.desc: Mega Evolution has caused Scrafty's shed skin to turn white, growing tough and supple. Of course, this Pokémon is still as feisty as ever.
cobblemon.species.skarmory-mega.desc: It flies faster than the speed of sound. After whipping up shock waves to send enemies flying, it finishes them off with its talons.
cobblemon.species.starmie-mega.desc: Its movements have become more humanlike. Whether it's simply trying to communicate or wants to supplant humanity is unclear.
cobblemon.species.victreebel-mega.desc: The volume of this Pokémon's acid has increased due to Mega Evolution, filling its mouth. If it's not careful, the acid will overflow and spill out.
cobblemon.species.floette-mega.desc: The Eternal Flower has absorbed all the energy from Mega Evolution. The flower now attacks enemies on its own.
cobblemon.species.zygarde-mega.desc: In response to people's emotions during an unprecedented crisis, Zygarde Mega Evolves and calms the situation with its unmatched power.
cobblemon.move.nihillight.desc: The user attacks by unleashing a powerful light that defies all laws of nature, striking even Fairy types and ignoring any stat changes affecting its targets.
